thread.title: $250M Mother-Son Team Joins LPL Financial from Edward Jones, Thrivent | LPLA Stock News
thread.title_full: $250M Mother-Son Team Joins LPL Financial from Edward Jones, Thrivent | LPLA Stock News

author: StockTitan
title: $250M Mother-Son Team Joins LPL Financial from Edward Jones, Thrivent | LPLA Stock News
text:
LPL Financial Welcomes ProsperLane Financial
LPL Financial (NASDAQ:LPLA) has announced that ProsperLane Financial, a mother-son team managing approximately $250 million in assets, has joined LPL's broker-dealer and RIA platform. The team consists of Sheri Johnston, CFP® (formerly with Edward Jones) and Jason Hotzler (previously with Thrivent Investment Management), who together bring over 25 years of experience.
Based near Minneapolis, ProsperLane Financial specializes in serving young professionals, small businesses, and family-run firms. The team chose LPL for its enhanced technology offerings and succession planning support. LPL Financial currently supports over 29,000 financial advisors and approximately 1,200 financial institutions, with approximately $1.8 trillion in brokerage and advisory assets under management.
LPL Financial (NASDAQ:LPLA) ha annunciato che ProsperLane Financial, un team composto da madre e figlio che gestisce circa 250 milioni di dollari in asset, si è unito alla piattaforma broker-dealer e RIA di LPL. Il team è formato da Sheri Johnston, CFP® (precedentemente presso Edward Jones) e Jason Hotzler (in precedenza con Thrivent Investment Management), che insieme vantano oltre 25 anni di esperienza.
Con sede nei pressi di Minneapolis, ProsperLane Financial si specializza nel servire giovani professionisti, piccole imprese e aziende familiari. Il team ha scelto LPL per le sue avanzate soluzioni tecnologiche e il supporto nella pianificazione della successione. Attualmente, LPL Financial supporta oltre 29.000 consulenti finanziari e circa 1.200 istituzioni finanziarie, gestendo circa 1,8 trilioni di dollari in asset di intermediazione e consulenza.
LPL Financial (NASDAQ:LPLA) ha anunciado que ProsperLane Financial, un equipo compuesto por madre e hijo que administra aproximadamente 250 millones de dólares en activos, se ha unido a la plataforma broker-dealer y RIA de LPL. El equipo está formado por Sheri Johnston, CFP® (anteriormente en Edward Jones) y Jason Hotzler (antes en Thrivent Investment Management), quienes juntos aportan más de 25 años de experiencia.
Con sede cerca de Minneapolis, ProsperLane Financial se especializa en atender a jóvenes profesionales, pequeñas empresas y negocios familiares. El equipo eligió LPL por sus avanzadas ofertas tecnológicas y apoyo en la planificación de sucesión. Actualmente, LPL Financial respalda a más de 29,000 asesores financieros y aproximadamente 1,200 instituciones financieras, con cerca de 1.8 billones de dólares en activos de corretaje y asesoría bajo gestión.
LPL Financial (NASDAQ:LPLA)는 약 2억 5천만 달러의 자산을 관리하는 모자 팀인 ProsperLane Financial이 LPL의 브로커-딜러 및 RIA 플랫폼에 합류했다고 발표했습니다. 이 팀은 Sheri Johnston, CFP® (이전에는 Edward Jones 소속)와 Jason Hotzler (이전에는 Thrivent Investment Management 소속)로 구성되어 있으며, 두 사람은 합쳐서 25년 이상의 경험을 보유하고 있습니다.
미니애폴리스 인근에 기반을 둔 ProsperLane Financial은 젊은 전문가, 소규모 기업 및 가족 경영 기업을 전문으로 합니다. 이 팀은 향상된 기술 제공과 승계 계획 지원 때문에 LPL을 선택했습니다. 현재 LPL Financial은 29,000명 이상의 금융 자문가와 약 1,200개의 금융 기관을 지원하며, 약 1.8조 달러 규모의 중개 및 자문 자산을 관리하고 있습니다.
LPL Financial (NASDAQ:LPLA) a annoncé que ProsperLane Financial, une équipe mère-fils gérant environ 250 millions de dollars d'actifs, a rejoint la plateforme courtier-négociant et RIA de LPL. L'équipe est composée de Sheri Johnston, CFP® (anciennement chez Edward Jones) et Jason Hotzler (précédemment chez Thrivent Investment Management), qui cumulent plus de 25 ans d'expérience.
Basée près de Minneapolis, ProsperLane Financial se spécialise dans le service aux jeunes professionnels, aux petites entreprises et aux sociétés familiales. L'équipe a choisi LPL pour ses offres technologiques améliorées et son soutien à la planification successorale. LPL Financial soutient actuellement plus de 29 000 conseillers financiers et environ 1 200 institutions financières, avec environ 1,8 billion de dollars d'actifs en courtage et gestion conseillée.
LPL Financial (NASDAQ:LPLA) hat bekannt gegeben, dass ProsperLane Financial, ein Mutter-Sohn-Team, das etwa 250 Millionen US-Dollar an Vermögenswerten verwaltet, sich der Broker-Dealer- und RIA-Plattform von LPL angeschlossen hat. Das Team besteht aus Sheri Johnston, CFP® (zuvor bei Edward Jones) und Jason Hotzler (zuvor bei Thrivent Investment Management), die zusammen über 25 Jahre Erfahrung verfügen.
Mit Sitz in der Nähe von Minneapolis spezialisiert sich ProsperLane Financial auf die Betreuung junger Berufstätiger, kleiner Unternehmen und familiengeführter Firmen. Das Team entschied sich für LPL aufgrund der verbesserten Technologieangebote und der Unterstützung bei der Nachfolgeplanung. LPL Financial unterstützt derzeit über 29.000 Finanzberater und rund 1.200 Finanzinstitute mit etwa 1,8 Billionen US-Dollar an verwalteten Brokerage- und Beratungsvermögen.
- None.
- None.
SAN DIEGO, July 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LPL Financial LLC announced today that mother and son team, Sheri Johnston, CFP® and Jason Hotzler, from ProsperLane Financial have joined LPL Financial’s broker-dealer, Registered Investment Advisor (RIA). They reported serving approximately
Based outside of Minneapolis in Prior Lake, Minn., Johnston and Hotzler have over 25 years of experience. They focus on serving young professionals who can grow into long-term clients, as well as small businesses and family-run firms.
“Our client philosophy is simple. We stand by our values of personalized customer service, quality products, reasonable expenses and always doing what is best for the client,” said Hotzler. “My family has owned businesses throughout my lifetime, so I’m excited to finally have a small business that I can share with my mother. We connect well with other family business clients, because it just speaks to where we’ve come from and what we’ve been doing for generations.”
Why ProsperLane Financial chose LPL
Looking for improved technology offerings to provide an elevated client experience and the counsel and support to create a succession plan for ProsperLane, the team turned to LPL after an extensive due diligence process.
“I chose LPL after a lengthy review of options available to me and my son. I wanted to build a multigenerational financial services office which would allow us to work together as a team and expand our services to our clients,” said Johnston. “We want to grow and have additional staff who have expertise in tax, accounting and legal fields. LPL gives us powerful resources and the freedom to support our growth, our way.”
Scott Posner, Managing Director, Business Development, said, “We welcome Sheri and Jason to LPL. LPL offers innovative technology and the strategic support advisors can use to deliver differentiated client experiences. We look forward to supporting the team as they continue to grow and support families in the Minneapolis area.”

Advisors, learn how LPL Financial can help take your business to the next level.
About LPL Financial
LPL Financial Holdings Inc. (Nasdaq: LPLA) is among the fastest growing wealth management firms in the U.S. As a leader in the financial advisor-mediated marketplace, LPL supports over 29,000 financial advisors and the wealth management practices of approximately 1,200 financial institutions, servicing and custodying approximately www.lpl.com.
Securities and advisory services offered through LPL Financial LLC (“LPL Financial”), a registered investment advisor and broker-dealer, member FINRA/SIPC. ProsperLane Financial and LPL Financial are separate entities.
Throughout this communication, the terms “financial advisors” and “advisors” are used to refer to registered representatives and/or investment advisor representatives affiliated with LPL Financial.
We routinely disclose information that may be important to shareholders in the “Investor Relations” or “Press Releases” section of our website.
*Value approximated based on asset and holding details provided to LPL from end of year, 2024.
Media Contact: Media.relations@LPLFinancial.com
